civilopediaText.text: Men mounted on horse, the skilled Gauchos from the Northern river plains were masters at the livestock work, who were the cogs behind the important livestock economy. Good warriors as well, fighting for independence and conquering the Patagonia for Argentina.

This elite and ferrous unit is not to be underestimated. Their homeland is the only thing they strive for, having a great performance on the wars, although it was not enough for the bad government's strategy.

Arguably the best piece of military equipment made in Latin America. The EE-09 Cascavel is a tank but on wheels, but a dangerous tank for the enemy, allowing it more agility and versatility in the rough terrains of the continent.
The patriotic sail men of the squadrons defeated both the Spanish and Peruvian fleets against expectations. They don't fear nor the terrific Pacific nor a heavy Ironclad.

The best elite commando units of, arguably, the hemisphere, they specialize in Jungle combat and anti-narcotraffic operations. These spec ops units excel at headhunting, annd they continue to prove their skill to this very day.

Drafted patriotic men willing to give it all for their country's sovereignty. Going through volcanic chains, jungles and forest, these brave warriors fought to the bitter end to give their country hope.

name: Guerrillero
uniques: May enter foreign tiles without open borders

civilopediaText.text: These sons of a mother fought on all corners of the world to spread their spirit of revolution and founding countless guerrilla groups to be feared, from South America to Africa, causing terror and chaos to the inhabiants.
Their show of discipline elevated them to be the elite cavalry of equatorial nation. Having fought on harsh terrain, the grenadiers didn't break their discipline.

name: Mawon
uniques: [+15]% Strength <within [1] tiles of a [City center]> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

civilopediaText.text: A fleeing, or rather, emancipating slave, who runs for his life - should he not suffer any more under the whip.

Fierce pilots who trained and fought with the US against a common enemy, the Empire of Japan. Battling with the unstoppable warriors of Japan on the Pacific Ocean, the brave men earned their respect and marked high the name of their country.

name: Geologic Process
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Darien Gap] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia

civilopediaText.text: Courageous horsemen who fought to the bitter end, on harsh biomes, climate and conditions, but nevertheless their lion courage made all their acts heroic.
Marching on the Andes is no easy task, even less when you are forced to in order to capture the mayor population centers. But these units did the task as hard as it was.
From a rag-tag arm, to one of the most professional ones on the continent, soldiers from three countries join together to earn freedom for their people and the rest of the continent.

name: Llanero
uniques: [+5]% Strength bonus for [Mounted] units within [0] tiles
Can transform to [Llanero Patrol] <after discovering [Military Science]>

civilopediaText.text: The Llaneros are among the most skilled cowboys on the continent. Taking their name from the Eastern Plains that accompany the Orinoco River to the sea, these brave people are made strong by the dangerous environment they live in.
Across the Plains, from Venezuela to Colombia, these ranchers have risen in arms to defend the will of the people and take down the tyrant enemy, with courage and bravery, no matter the cost.
